intent_analysis:
Intent: The user expects to confirm whether all the meross light strips in their home are currently turned on and operational.  
Constraints & cues: The user is inquiring about the status of all available meross light strips, which include devices with IDs 22e11820, 363f714d, and 571f0327, and they may want to adjust brightness or color afterward.  
Risk assessment: There is a risk of ambiguity regarding whether the user is referring only to the meross light strips or all lights in the home, including other types of lighting devices. Further clarification is needed to ensure all relevant devices are included in the status check.
environment_overview:
1) 检测到的设备及位置：家中有多个 meross 灯带，分别为 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298、363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709 和 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d。每个灯带的功能包括开关、亮度调节、色温控制和颜色控制。设备的主要组件状态显示，22e11820 的亮度为 70，色温为 2700K，饱和度为 100；363f714d 的亮度为 48，色温为 7000K；571f0327 的亮度为 35，色温为 2300K，饱和度为 100。

2) 当前状态及控制提示：所有 meross 灯带的开关状态均为开启。22e11820 的亮度为 70，363f714d 的亮度为 48，571f0327 的亮度为 35。其他设备如 Samsung The Frame 电视和 Samsung 8 系列电视的开关状态也为开启，而洗碗机处于关闭状态。根据用户的命令，所有灯光的状态已确认，后续可进行亮度或颜色的调整。
